room_title: Escape room "The Lost City of the Monkey God" by Escape Room Westford in Boston
room_description:
The lure of finding a lost city, its treasures, and its glory, is too much for you and your archeological colleagues to ignore. Your teamâ€™s years of research has led to the irrefutable conclusion that the legendary Lost City of the Monkey God is real, and can be found in a nearly impenetrable section of the Honduran rainforest.
As you arrive in the jungle, it becomes evident that a severe storm is rolling in, and the helicopter pilot says you have one hour to find, and prove the existence of the City... or she is leaving without you!
